long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Forget about tab pining, welcome to Pricebookmark!
Use Pricebookmark extension to pin goods from any online shop you like, track the price changes any make purchases at the most convenient moment.
Plicebookmark allows to save goods from all the online shops into your personal Wish List and to compare prices. One of the crucial advantages is an ability
 to track the price changes for the goods from your wish list. Our extension synchronizes with online shops and updates prices in real time. You can also follow
the goods that are added by other users and add interesting ones to your list.
The extension will perfectly suit to all the users which are fond of online shopping and want to save time and money!
